1: My soul finds hope and salvation in God.
2: I stand strong and secure with my solid foundation.
3: I find strength in unity and support from those around me.
4: I focus on honesty and seek uplifting connections.
5: I trust and wait on God with full expectation.
6: I stand strong and secure in my unwavering support.
7: God is my strength and safe refuge.
8: I trust and share my heart, finding refuge and strength.
9: True worth comes from character, not social status.
10: I focus on what truly matters instead of chasing wealth.
11: I recognize that all power belongs to the divine.
12: I receive mercy and rewards for my good actions.
